body.sentence: Activation of polystyrene surface The wells of a polystyrene plate were activated by coating with FNAB followed by photoactivation by UV light for 15 min at a wavelength of 365 nm as described

Detection of analyte In activated and untreated polystyrene plates analyte \( human IgG, human IgE) was detected by immobilizing capture molecule \ (anti-human IgG, anti-human IgE) onto the activated and untreated polystyrene plates followed by blocking , binding of analyte and secondary antibody-conjugate
The plates were washed after each step
Color development was carried out by adding substrate- dye buffer and then stopped by adding 20 μl of 5% Sulfuric acid and absorbance was recorded at 490 nm.
